properties.Name: Urban Patchwork 5703 Duval
properties.Description:
Urban Patchwork can use food scraps to feed chickens and compost piles

Email info@urbanpatchwork.com for hours

properties.Name: Food Is Free 5608 Joe Sayers
properties.Description:
Food Is Free can use food scraps to feed chickens and compost piles

Email info@foodisfreeproject.org for hours and details

properties.Name: Wood chips - mulch
properties.Description:
Austin Resource and Recovery
Free wood chips/mulch and tumbled glass mulch available M-F 8 am - 4:30 pm

properties.Name: Sawdust/wood chips
properties.Description: Wood shop produces bags of untreated wood chips/sawdust.  Great for animal bedding, mulch, and composting.   Email John@redriverrestorations.com to check availability and arrange pickup

properties.Name: Horse manure
properties.Description: FREE HORSE MANURE - bring containers & shovel it yourself ANYTIME during daylight or they will fill your truck/trailer with our tractor for a $10 loading charge. Call Mike at 512-497-3200 to set up time if you need weekend loading. If you come Mon-Th 9-12 for loading, then there is no need to call.  Entrance is on Whitecliff. Directions: Off Loop 360, go West on Spicewood Springs Rd. Go 1 mile, Turn L on Whitecliff. Follow road to our farm gate. Pull in, shut gate behind you, drive directly past the barn and you will see the gate to the pasture that has the manure pile!

properties.Name: New Earth Kitchen
properties.Description:
New Earth Kitchen

3708 Woodbury Dr, 78704

Organic fruit and veggie scraps, 2-5 buckets available once a week.  Email Compost Coalition  to get on the calendar

properties.Name: Monkey Nest
properties.Description:
Buckets of coffee grounds, filters and tea available during business hours
Mon - Thu
Open 6:00 AM
Close 10:00 PM

Fri
Open 6:00 AM
Close 11:00 PM

Sat
Open 7:00 AM
Close 11:00 PM
Sun
Open 7:00 AM
Close 10:00 PM

properties.Name: ThunderCloud
properties.Description: Food and paper.  Two to four buckets daily.  Email info@compostcoalition.com for more information

properties.Name: Sunshine Gardens
properties.Description:
Sunshine Community Gardens accepts food scraps and coffee grounds.  Look for the sign at the southeast of the property
Open dusk to dawn
Please NO meat or dairy products, spoiled prepared foods or any kind of "compostable" flat ware or dishes

properties.Name: Organics by Gosh
properties.Description:
13602 Fm 969, Austin, TX 78724

This is a commercial facility that accepts all organic materials including unpainted, untreated wood and sheetrock

Hours: Mon-Fri 7:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Saturday 8:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m.

http://www.organicsbygosh.com

properties.Name: Starbucks - I35/Oltorf
properties.Description:
Starbucks - I35 at Oltorf (Southwest corner)
Look for bucket inside north door

properties.Name: Starbucks - Ben White(71) near 35
properties.Description:
Starbucks on the north/eastbound side of Ben White/Hwy 71
Look for bucket near east door

properties.Name: Flightpath Coffee
properties.Description:
Flightpath Coffee gives all of their grounds to Sunshine Community Gardens every week!  We love these type of partnerships.


If you're looking for nearby grounds, go to Dolce Vita at 4222 Duval!  (Just down the street.)

properties.Name: Reagan Community Garden
properties.Description:
Reagan Community Garden takes fruit and vegetable scraps/plants (healthy- no disease); bread; any plant type of material kitchen or otherwise (healthy); and egg shells. Would also love to have your leaves, shredded paper or newspapers.

Do NOT take meat scraps; dairy (cheese, cream or milk); grass clippings or diseased plant material.

properties.Name: East Village Cafe
properties.Description:
East Village Cafe, 1111 Chicon Street, eastvillagecafe.com
7 days a week - 7:00am-9:00pm
Ask for grounds at the counter.

properties.Name: Alamo Community Garden
properties.Description:
Alamo Community Garden, northeast corner of Alamo and 21st

Drop off coffee grounds 24/7 to help improve the garden soil

properties.Name: Farmers Market at the Triangle
properties.Description: Drop off all your compostable materials including wood and paper while you shop at the Farmers Market at the Triangle each Wednesday 4 - 7.  Thanks to Break It Down for collecting!

properties.Name: Farmers Market at Sunset Valley
properties.Description: Drop off all of your compostable materials while you shop at the Farmers Market at 3200 Jones Road at the Toney Burger Center each Saturday 9am - 1pm.  Materials go back to the local farmers!

properties.Name: Farmers Market Downtown
properties.Description: Drop off your compostable materials when you shop the SFC Downtown Farmers Market at 4th and Guadalupe each Saturday from 9am to 1 pm.  Thanks to Break It Down for collecting!

properties.Name: St Davids Foundation Community Garden
properties.Description:
Located just east of the MLK Rail Station, (Enter gravel road from MLK  Boulevard immediately east of the tracks)

Accepts fruit and vegetable scraps, egg shells, coffee grounds, clean leaves and clean mulch. Please no meat, dairy, bermuda grass or invasive weeds.

Drop off during daylight hours.

properties.Name: AgriLife Extension Demo Garden
properties.Description:
Accepting coffee grounds, leaves and other plant material only.  No food please.

Compost bins are at the southeast of the building.

properties.Name: Wet Whistle
properties.Description: Open 7:00am - midnight.  Ask about grounds at the register!

properties.Name: Thai Fresh
properties.Description:
Thai Fresh at 909 Mary Street West is open 11am-9pm
Stop by for tasty treats and grounds. Bring a clean bucket to replace any you take.

properties.Name: Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf - 4100 Red River
properties.Description:
Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf - 4100 Red River
Open 5:30am-10pm M-F, 7am-9pm S-S
Look for bagged grounds to the left of the front door. Also offer buckets of grounds. Bring a clean Ground to Ground bucket to swap for one full of coffee grounds

properties.Name: 5604 Manor Community Garden
properties.Description:
5604 Manor Road

Accepts all food scraps except meet, dairy, and processed foods. Also accept leaves, grass clippings, and all plant material, except diseased plant material, invasive weeds, and bermuda grass.

Open on Saturdays 9-12

The bins are located in the middle of our backyard. Just talk to someone there if you need assistance.

properties.Name: Blackshear Neighborhood Garden
properties.Description: Blackshear Neighborhood Garden, at 2011 East 9th, has compost bins and would love coffee grounds and any other compostables (food scrap, leaves...)  http://communitygardensaustin.org/?page_id=26

properties.Name: Food Pantry Gardens at St Andrews
properties.Description:
Food Pantry Gardens at St Andrews Presbyterian church, 14311 Wells Port Drive,


Accepts coffee grounds, egg shells (not eggs), yard clippings, leaves, paper shredded if possible, fruits and vegetables.

No meat, dairy or diseased plant materials please.
Compost bins are at the east end of the parking lot. Please cover materials with dirt, paper or leaves available near the bins.

properties.Name: Austin Skinny Limits
properties.Description:
Austin Skinny Limits has buckets of fruit and veggie pulp.  No meat or dairy, just finely shredded vegetable matter. Pineapple included so may not be suitable for worms.

They are bagging the materials in trash bags and setting them out by the dumpster.  Stop by anytime day or night.

properties.Name: AGE of Austin
properties.Description:
Paper towels from AGE offices plus coffee grounds too. These are the brown, recycled content paper towels which will break down nicely in compost systems.  Can be shredded to speed up decomposition or as is will add air pockets and carbon to your system.

Flexible pickup times.  Email for details on how you can get some for yourself or your favorite community garden.  Coffee grounds also available!

properties.Name: Allandale Yard
properties.Description:
Chipped wood available from this tree service yard at 9513 Brown Lane.  Hours are flexible, just email to make arrangements  GBartSherman@gmail.com

Have front loader available to fill trailers.  May be able to deliver large quantity for transport fee only.

Also, has brush available.

properties.Name: Vintage Heart Coffee
properties.Description: Vintage Heart Coffee offers buckets of grounds from 11AM - 10PM.  Just ask at the counter!

properties.Name: Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf - 183/Anderson Mill
properties.Description:
Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf has bagged grounds as well as buckets for exchange
Hours M-F 5am-10pm, Sat 6am-10 pm, Sun 7am-9pm

properties.Name: Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf - 221 S Lamar
properties.Description:
Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf has bagged grounds as well as buckets for exchange
Hours M-F 5:30am-9pm, Sat 6am-9pm, Sun 6am-8pm

properties.Name: Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf - Steiner Ranch/Quinlan Crossing
properties.Description:
Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf has bagged grounds as well as buckets for exchange

Hours M-F 5am-9pm, Sat-Sun 6am-8pm

properties.Name: Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf - Slaughter/Mopac
properties.Description:
Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf has bagged grounds as well as buckets for exchange
Hours M-F 10:30am-10pm, Sat 10:30am-10 pm, Sun 10:30am-8pm Try to avoid the morning rush!

properties.Name: Waterloo Ice House - Circle C
properties.Description:
Waterloo Ice House in Circle C:

Come get grounds from your favorite local diner!

Mon - Sat 7am - Midnight, Sunday 8am - 11pm

properties.Name: Third Coast Coffee Roasting Company
properties.Description:
Third Coast Coffee - Ground to Ground's first Roasting Company!

Coffee chaff is a great mulch, chicken litter or brown for the compost.  They also generate a couple of buckets a week of coffee grounds.  Bring a clean bucket and exchange for one full of coffee grounds or coffee chaff..

Hours are weekdays (except Wednesday) 9am-6pm.

properties.Name: Star Co. Coffee House
properties.Description:
Spent coffee grounds available in buckets on the back porch (off the alley side) anytime during business hours. Bring your own clean 4-5gal bucket to replace the one you take.

Monday-Friday 6a-9p, Sat 7a-9p, Sun 7a-7p

They are also collecting greens from the kitchen.  Also available in buckets at the back porch.

properties.Name: Genuine Joe Coffeehouse
properties.Description:
Genuine Joe Coffeehouse offers buckets of grounds in North Austin!
Hours are M-F 7:00am - 11:00pm; Weekends 8:00am - 11:00pm.  Try to avoid rush hours when asking for grounds (unless you're buying coffee!) Pickup location is to the right of the side entrance.  Please bring clean buckets to take full buckets.
Phone number is (512) 220-1576.

properties.Name: Waterloo Ice House - 360
properties.Description:
Waterloo Ice House on 360 is now offering grounds to customers!  Due to lack of inside space, buckets of grounds will be kept by the dumpster in the parking lot.  Make sure to return clean buckets to an employee inside!

Hours:  Monday-Saturday 7:00am - Midnight;

Sunday 9:00am - 11:00pm

properties.Name: Round Rock Brush Recycling Center
properties.Description:
Hours of operation:
Closed Sunday
9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Monday-Saturday
Brush Recycling Center (512) 218-5559
Recycling Center (512) 218-7047

Accept: tree trimmings, branches, limbs, and other parts of shrubs and trees.

Not accepted: leaves (bagged leaves and grass clippings are accepted at the front Recycling Center), grass, landscape waste (palm trees, cacti, compost), tree stumps, treated wood such as telephone poles, railroad ties, lumber, demolition debris, rock, concrete, hazardous waste, and household garbage.

Residents within Round Rock City limits (must show a current City of Round Rock water bill and valid drivers license to qualify for free drop off) can drop off 2 cubic yards or less for free.

http://www.roundrocktexas.gov/home/index.asp?page=632

properties.Name: Round Rock Brush Recycling Center
properties.Description:
Hours of operation:
Closed Sunday
9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Monday-Saturday
Brush Recycling Center (512) 218-5559
Recycling Center (512) 218-7047
Residents within Round Rock City limits (must show a current City of Round Rock water bill and valid drivers license to qualify for free drop off) may take small pickup truck loads of mulch during the Center's hours of operation. No commercial vehicles, dump trucks or large trailers qualify for free residential mulch.
http://www.roundrocktexas.gov/home/index.asp?page=632

properties.Name: The Coffee Cup
properties.Description:
The Coffee Cup offers buckets of grounds - just ask at the counter!

Ask for grounds at the counter any time between 4:00-6:00pm.

(512) 291-8591

properties.Name: Wok on Fire
properties.Description:
Wok on Fire is now offering grounds to fire up your compost pile!

They offer grounds from 1-7, and 8-9:45pm.  Ask at the counter!

(512) 291-8886

properties.Name: Manchaca Eco-Faith Initiative Community Garden
properties.Description: Manchaca Eco-Faith Initiative Community Garden is accepting coffee grounds.

properties.Name: Talbot property
properties.Description:
Accepts vegetable matter only - please no meat or cattle or horse manures

Call Jim at 512.914.8261 for address and details

properties.Name: Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf - 290W
properties.Description: The newest Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf!Stop by to welcome them to the neighborhood and pick up coffee grounds for your garden.

properties.Name: McDonald's - 5516 N Lamar
properties.Description:
McDonald's open 5am-11pm.

Stop by for lots of buckets or bags of grounds

properties.Name: Saw dust/ wood chips
properties.Description: Wood shop produces bags of untreated wood chips/sawdust.  Great for animal bedding, mulch, and composting.   Email John @redriverrestorations.com to check availability and arrange pick up

properties.Name: Asplundh Tree Expert Co.
properties.Description: Asplundh is located at 13131 Pond Springs Rd. They have a big hill of mulch from all the trees they take down. You can just drive in (before 3pm on weekdays) and load up to a truckload.

properties.Name: Manure - ALL Animals Rescue and Sanctuary
properties.Description:
Free Manure  - They provide Bags, Etc., So Bring Gloves And A Bandana! You Scoop)! ;-)

Location: Northwest corner of North A W Grimes Blvd. (FM 1460 also known as Old Georgetown Road) and FM 3406 (which is Exit 254 on I-H 35 turning East) also known as Old Settlers Blvd at the Green Farm House in between Jerry's Garage (look for Jerry's Garage Big white tall billboard on North A. W. Grimes Blvd) and the big red old barn (which you can see from the highway

Please, call 512-689-5117 for an appointment

properties.Name: Upper Crust Bakery
properties.Description:
Don't want to mess with buckets?  Uppercrust Bakery offers big bags of grounds!

M-W 6:30am - 5:00pm

Th-Fri 6:30am-6:00pm

Sat 7:00am - 5:00pm

Sun 7:00am - 1:00pm

properties.Name: Third Coast Coffee Roasting Company
properties.Description:
Third Coast Coffee Roasting Company has TONS of grounds to give away... from fresh-roasted beans!  They also give away chaff, the drier fibrous husk of the coffee bean, by the bag.  Just ask at the coffee shop counter.

Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday 9am - 6pm

Wednesday 9am - 3pm

properties.Name: Dolce Vita
properties.Description:
As their name suggests, Dolce Vita has some of the sweetest grounds in town!

Bring in an empty bucket to receive one full of grounds.

Monday - Friday: 6:30am - Midnight

Saturday & Sunday: 8:00am - Midnight

properties.Name: Galaxy Cafe at the Triangle
properties.Description:
Galaxy Cafe produces a couple of buckets of grounds a week.  Stop by for breakfast, lunch, happy hour or dinner and while you're there trade out a clean Ground to Ground bucket for one full of spent grounds.

Open 7am to 10pm every day

properties.Name: Joseph's Place
properties.Description:
Feed chickens and compost!

Drop off food scraps including meat, egg shells, bread, fruit, and vegetable scraps; any type of plant material (healthy - no disease). Would also love to have your leaves or shredded paper. Drop off food in secure plastic buckets (kitty litter buckets OK) and leave in driveway near trash can. Swap full buckets for clean buckets. Paper and leaves OK in trash bags.

Email josephmdeleon@gmail.com for more details.

properties.Name: Fair Bean Coffee
properties.Description:
Fair Bean Coffee brings in tasty, responsibly sourced beans from around the world, and roasts them in-house.  They also serve "red espresso" and have a full kitchen!

6:30am - 7:00pm Sun - Wed

6:30am - 8:00pm Thurs - Sat

512-444-BEAN / www.fairbeancoffee.com

Find buckets of spent grounds outside by the door.

properties.Name: Texas Coffee Traders
properties.Description:
Texas Coffee Traders

Monday - Friday 8 a.m. - 5 p.m.
Saturday 10 a.m. - 3 p.m.
(512) 476-2279
Bring your own containers!

Stop by this locally owned and operated East Austin artisanal coffee roaster for some beans or a scrumptious drink and take home grounds for your garden or chaff for your chickens and compost

properties.Name: Hoover/'s Cooking
properties.Description:
Hoovers Cooking


2002 Manor Road
Austin, TX 78722
Phone: (512) 479-5006
Fax: (512) 479-0889

Monday through Friday..11 a.m.  10 p.m.
Saturday & Sunday.8 a.m  10 p.m.

Buckets of grounds available.

properties.Name: Lola Savannah
properties.Description:
Lola Savannah Coffee Lounge

Monday  Friday open at 6 a.m. and Saturday  Sunday open at 7 a.m.

Stop by and visit us. We have a feeling our ambiance will charm you and the quality of our coffee drinks will keep you coming back.  Buckets of grounds available during business hours.  Just ask!

properties.Name: Starbucks - Mopac at Wm Cannon
properties.Description:
Starbucks in the West Creek Shopping Center
Mopac at William Cannon has bagged grounds by the door.  Hours 5am-10pm daily

properties.Name: The Hideout Coffeehouse
properties.Description:
The Hideout is downtown Austins oldest independent coffee house. Open morning to night, weekdays and weekends and serve beer, wine, fresh sandwiches, pastries, ice cream, as well as an assortment of beverages and coffee drinks and now coffee grounds too!

Ask at the counter for buckets of grounds

Phone: (512) 476-1313

Hours:
Monday-Wednesday 7am-11pm
Thursday-Friday 7am-1am
Saturday 8am-1am
Sunday: 8am-10pm
